properties.description: Open from 8th Nov 2022. Anyone and everyone is welcome to join our friendly warm space. We offer a space to sit, chat, read, have a cuppa, play with your kids, do a craft or just be! We will also provide a flask exchange, so you can fill a free flask of hot water.
